dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.inc.SecurityIncidentImpact
dataStructure.description:
The encompassing impact due to an incident, including financial loss, loss to operations, etc.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SecurityIncidentImpact

child.name: encompassingFinancialImpact
child.description:
Financial impact due to Incident

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: encompassingFinancialImpact

child.name: staffHoursLost
child.description:
Estimate of staff hours lost due to the incident

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: staffHoursLost

child.name: totalResourcesAffected
child.description:
Total number of resources directly impacted by the incident

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: totalResourcesAffected

child.name: accessLevel
child.description:
Level of access obtained by the intruder, such as Root or User access.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: accessLevel
